mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO d_appointment (book_id, student_id) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{studentId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.book_id, a.student_id, a.appoint_time, b.book_id "book.book_id", b.`name` "book.name", b.number "book.number" FROM d_appointment a INNER JOIN d_book b ON a.book_id = b.book_id WHERE a.book_id = #{bookId}
